Instruction: Combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a bowl. In a separate bowl, whisk eggs until well beaten, then mix in sour cream and vanilla extract. Blend in the flour mixture, then add milk and melted butter to create a thin, smooth batter.
Melt the butter in a skillet over medium heat until fragrant. Pour enough batter to thinly coat the skillet. Cook until lightly browned on one side, then flip and brown the other side.
